articles.title: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk shot and killed in what's being called a “political assassination”
articles.description: Conservative political activist Charlie Kirk was shot and killed during an outdoor event at Utah Valley University. The 31-year-old founder of Turning Point USA was taking questions from the crowd when a single shot was fired. The FBI and ATF are investigating the incident, which has been labeled a "political assassination."

articles.title: NATO scrambles jets to shoot down Russian drones in Poland, raising fears of war spillover
articles.description: NATO forces, including Polish and Dutch fighter jets, shot down at least four of nineteen Russian drones that crossed into Polish airspace from Ukraine. The incident has been called an intentional act by Poland's foreign minister and has raised concerns about the potential for the conflict in Ukraine to spill over into NATO territory.

articles.title: Growing global outrage over Israel's failed strike on Hamas leaders inside U.S.-allied Qatar
articles.description: An Israeli airstrike targeting Hamas leaders in Doha, Qatar, has sparked international criticism, including from the United States. The strike, which took place in a residential area, has put hostage negotiations at risk and created diplomatic tensions between Israel and the U.S., as Qatar is a key ally and mediator in the region.
